summary: Tested BowWowMeow pet care application fixes for: Batch Scheduling UI (editable time pickers and remove buttons), Overnights tab on Admin Dashboard, and new Admin Time Off page. All features verified working correctly.

issues: Location Services modal appears on every page navigation - should persist user choice in localStorage

batch_scheduling_ui_time_pickers.details: Each walk in the batch list has an editable time picker (Select component with 15-minute increments from 6:00 AM to 8:00 PM). Clicking the time dropdown opens a scrollable list of times. Time can be changed for any walk in the batch list.

batch_scheduling_ui_remove_buttons.details: Each walk in the batch list has a red X button (data-testid='remove-batch-walk-{id}') to delete the walk. Clicking the X removes the walk from the batch list.

batch_scheduling_copy_yesterday.details: Copy Yesterday button successfully loads walks from the previous day. Toast notification shows 'Copied 1 walk from yesterday'. Copied walks appear in the batch list and can be edited/removed.

batch_scheduling_load_recurring.details: Load Recurring Walks button successfully loads recurring schedules for the selected day. Toast notification shows 'Loaded 2 recurring walks for Sunday'. Loaded walks appear with 'Recurring' badge and can be edited/removed.

overnights_tab_on_admin_dashboard.details: Overnights tab (data-testid='overnights-tab') on Admin Dashboard displays overnight stays correctly. Shows 1 overnight stay (Rover - petsit our location) with CHECK IN badge. Multi-day appointments now correctly appear when the current date falls within the start_date and end_date range.

admin_timeoff_page.details: New Admin Time Off page (/admin/time-off) loads successfully. Page has: 'Time Off & Reassignments' title, summary cards showing counts, two tabs: 'Needs Reassignment' and 'Time-Off History', and a Refresh button.

timeoff_quick_action_card.details: Time Off quick action card visible on Admin Dashboard under Schedule tab. Card shows 'Time Off' title with 'Reassignments' subtitle and navigates to /admin/time-off when clicked.

critical_code_review_comments: Code review verified: CalendarPage.js lines 1607-1650 correctly implement editable time Select component for each walk in batch list with onChange handler to update scheduled_time
Code review verified: AdminDashboard.js lines 328-340 correctly filter overnights by checking if scheduleDate falls between scheduled_date and end_date
Code review verified: AdminTimeOffPage.js implements complete time-off management page with tabs and reassignment dialog
context_for_next_testing_agent: All three reported issues have been fixed and verified: 1) Batch Scheduling UI now has editable time pickers for each walk and remove (X) buttons work correctly, 2) Overnights tab now shows overnight stays that span multiple days by checking if current date falls within start_date and end_date range, 3) New AdminTimeOffPage.js provides admin UI for time-off requests and reassignments with two tabs.
